Class AppleScriptBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dhemery.osx.AppleScriptBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Builder<RunnableCommand>

    public class AppleScriptBuilder
extends Object
implements Builder<RunnableCommand>
    Builds AppleScript commands.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AppleScriptBuilder(Shell shell, String description)
      Create a builder for a command that will run in the given shell and describe itself with the given description.
